website_summaries.verdict: Some floors need cotton only, and this model provides a good cotton-only dust mop head.
pros: Can clean nearly any kind of surface
Mop heads are made from 100% cotton
Cotton heads are easy to change
cons: The handle on this model telescopes, but only to 59 inches, which is much shorter than some other telescoping mop handles

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and money!
customer_reviews.text: This dust mop is saving me a ton of time and my back! I have 3,000 square feet of hard wood and marble floors. No carpet. I also have 4 cats and one dog. All super shedders! I was using the Swiffer dust mop daily, but it was too small, took too long and had to change the cloth at least twice. Waste of time and money! Then I decided to go like the pros, I got JinClean’s 24” busy mop. What a great tool! Takes me 10 minutes at the most to do my house! Can a person love a cleaning tool? YES! You can’t go wrong with this product!
customer_reviews.author: C. Paola

customer_reviews.title: A dust mop that's  a real dust mop.
customer_reviews.text: I received my new just mop a few days ago and put it to work immediately. As a person who spent a year working as a janitor at a hospital right after college I know what a real dust mop is, and this is one. It's big enough and long enough and pivots completely and is a commercial grade. Great value and quality and a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Levinski

customer_reviews.title: Fastest, easiest way to sweep hard surface floors
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up an a must use for any hard surface. It cleans faster than a vacuum or broom. This model isn't too small or too large - just right. Much better than any micro-fiber mop.
customer_reviews.author: B. B. Vivian

customer_reviews.title: We have 6 dogs. This is a must have for anyone with multiple pets and lots of open floor space.
customer_reviews.text: Saves me soooo much time compared to a normal broom. AND it keeps the dander down compared to a normal broom where you make sweeping motions. You just walk around the house with this. Gets up on the baseboards too. If you have pets and lots of floors to sweep and don’t want to spend the money on an expensive pet vacuum or roomba then I highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: L Wootan

customer_reviews.title: Rather annoying.
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick. only reason I took a star off was the handle kept collapsing as I used it. Rather annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy product for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: The mop head is very flimsy. Would have expected a higher quality mop end for this price. I agree with other reviewers who said the mop head is so thin that the holder scraps the floor. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: robert w.

customer_reviews.title: I love this mop
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. I have hardwood floors and until now I've been using a regular broom. It would take hours to get the floors clean. This thing works great and gave me back time from being able to clean so much faster. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: The swivel portion could be a little easier to use it’s not like the ones you see in stores or office buildings. I use it in the home on my hardwood flooring and tiles- works great makes sweeping a breeze
customer_reviews.author: s9chodia

customer_reviews.title: It's a lot quicker to sweep and easier to use then any thing I've used!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had gotten it sooner, like years ago! This is the greatest mop ever. I bought 2 extra mop refills but I have not used them yet. I mop my floor every day, so my jinclean mop is still clean. I love that it is 24 inches wide so I finish sweeping quicker. it picks up every thing. It is light weight! I love this, it has saved my back, it has saved me time. I unhook it from the handle and shake it outside and it's ready for next time! (you don't have to unhook, you can shake it with the handle on if you prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely does the job
customer_reviews.text: This mop has revolutionized my cleaning routine. I have a dog that sheds an additional dog every other day - that is how much fur comes off him. With this mop I have been able to clean it up WAY more efficiently than sweeping or vacuuming. THANKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: Broke 30 seconds into light sweeping a office floor
customer_reviews.text: C'mon, the product didn't even last 30 seconds into light sweeping. Cheap!! I sure hope mine was defective cause if not someone needs to be fired for not testing product design. Terrible experience, waste of time ordering and waiting, now off to office depot to get a quality broom. I'm afraid I'm starting to think that the quality of products off Amazon is going downhill.
customer_reviews.author: CLP LLC

customer_reviews.title: The handle collapses.
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 being used twice the handle collapses. I try to tighten it, but it doesn't work. Extremely disappointed in this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after having hardwood floors installed. It is flimsy, the mop head "threads" are sparse causing the metal holder to scrape against the floor. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: E Evans

customer_reviews.title: Horrible dust mop head
customer_reviews.text: The handle was great. The dust mop head is thin and seems cheap. I feel like I'm pushing a thin dry washcloth across the floor. Usually dust mop heads have a decent weight to them and collect a lot. This does push some of the dirt, however, in a very dirty situation I'm not sure how well it will do. I am definitely going to have to buy a different mop head. Too much hassle to return the item and the handle is good so I'm just going to keep it. I wouldn't recommend this product for purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Penny H

customer_reviews.title: This thing is hell on pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: With 3 dogs (all big shedders) and 3 cats I had pet hair tumbleweeds floating everywhere around my house. This tool is a must for anyone with pets. It’s big enough to get the job done fast and picks up hair, dirt and dust all at once. Easy to clean-just remove the mop, shake it out and you’re ready for the next round. Glad I purchased this-good product.
customer_reviews.author: Katzenfrau

customer_reviews.title: Nice dry mop but big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: When they say industrial they mean it. This dry mop is big and heavy but does the trick. I have wood floors in my house and this is super. Building muscles in my arms. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: KarenKB

customer_reviews.title: Great For Pet Fur On Tile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to manage the long fur that my dogs shed. This thing is perfect for that! It's easy to use and quickly cleans my home.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Pad is very thin
customer_reviews.text: The pad has less than half the fiber of my O-Cedar pad. I actually needed a new handle, so I used the much fluffier pad from my old mop on the Jinclean handle and it works fine. I would have returned it if I didn't have a quick fix! The Jinclean pad would not have picked up fine dust from my wood and tile floors. C
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Does the job but cheap product.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Cheap. The mop part was decent...the arm just seems very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Doman

customer_reviews.title: More than five stars
customer_reviews.text: If there was a more than 5 star rating I would. Most of my house is hardwood. Sweeping used to take me a good 40 minutes to do the main rooms (not even the bedrooms) and I still felt like it wasn't getting everything. Now I can get through the whole house in 15 minutes. Its very sturdy and heavy duty. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great on wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for pet hair on wood floors! Using a broom and dust pan doesn't work well because the pet hair goes ffg flying when I sweep. This works great, a lot faster with the huge mop/duster head. I agree with other reviewers, it could be a little better quality mop/sweeper head but I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kofta

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a day and I'm over the moon. I have a large home, 4200 square feet with over a 1000 of that being tile or wood flooring. I was having such a struggle getting the dog hair picked up fast, it took quite a while with a regular broom especially with wofts of hair flying everywhere with every stroke. Now I can just glide around and get most of the hair in 1 swipe. I did not expect to like this broom so much but it cut my floor cleaning time down so much. A bit expensive but if you have a large area it may just be worth it lol.
customer_reviews.author: O'Doherty FamilyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: We use it every day
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for someone who has nothing but tile in their house. Easy to clean as well. Just pop it into the washer and dryer and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Perea

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy. Fibers inafective and spares
customer_reviews.text: To see this in person I would of never of Baugh this.flimbdy with Hardly any fibers to keep dirt and debris into the broom as your gliding across hard surfaces. Second time using this broom and it dies not pick up what a real industrial sweeper would☹️ I’m junking this thing and buying a better one
customer_reviews.author: Jon P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, handle loosens easily
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It makes cleaning up a large area of hardwood floors much quicker and easier than using a broom. My only complaint would be that the adjustable handle easily untwist as I'm using it. It's a bit annoying as I push around corners that the handle comes loose.
customer_reviews.author: missyg

customer_reviews.title: Just what is needed
customer_reviews.text: I've a hallway and first floor hall which are 20 feet wide and longer which is difficult to clean with other tools. This helps perfectly and pulls all debris that is close to the furniture legs or baseboard.
customer_reviews.author: ANIL

customer_reviews.title: This is what we use at work.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse at a State Hospital. I figure that if this dust mop is good enough for them, it should work perfect for me, and it does. We have 8 dogs and 2 cats, live in the country; my husband is a youth pastor so we also have kids in and out all the time; we are both satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The value received is equal to what I spent. The maneuverability is a little constrained when sweeping under furniture and such. That is exclusively my complaint. What I love about it is that it collects dirt, dust and cobwebs well. I use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Saves your back if you hv lots of sweeping !!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! We hv all hard surface floors in a newly purchased and sweeping was ridiculous, time consuming, & back hurting! We ordered this & can “sweep” so quickly and just shake in a pile! Can easily slip under the furniture. Saves the back & time!! Win-Win! If you hv lots of wood or hard surface floors to sweep- This is a game changer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping handle leads to cornering issues
customer_reviews.text: It glides nicely and grabs dirt and pet fur well, but because the telescoping handle locks by twisting, when you turn left, the handle loosens. I also had some issues with not being able to keep the head squared up with my forward momentum, but that might be operator error. Have not tried to wash it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ann Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was really a waste of money I should of just purchased one from Home Depot I should of tired to return this and hit my money back but I put the box in the trash You can hear it rubbing against the floor I’m so afraid it’s going to scratch it
customer_reviews.author: My jammin kreations

customer_reviews.title: Not good on cat chit
customer_reviews.text: This worked good until I ran it through a pile of cat dung. It spread like butter on a sandwich. Really smelled like chit
customer_reviews.author: Welfare Immigrant

customer_reviews.title: A great, heavy duty, wide dust mop.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and manuverability of this dust mop. It's wise, so it cleans a lot in one stroke. It turns corners easily, to get into crevices or corners. I wanted the heavy duty metal one. The only problem with that is the weight. It's a little hard for me to do high places without lowering my arms often.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and a cat, all shredders. Sweeping with a traditional broom is a joke, and my vacuum isn't effective either. A friend suggested I get a broom like the school janitor used...and it works great. I still need a dustpan, but it has cut my sweep time in half. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ann a.

customer_reviews.title: Love the size!
customer_reviews.text: I just moved to a home with hardwood floors and I have two blond labs who shed year round. This dry mop is a lifesaver. I can cover huge swathes of floor and yet still maneuver around furniture. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KsGrl444

customer_reviews.title: CUT YOUR CLEANING TIME IN HALF!
customer_reviews.text: With hardwood floors throughout my new home I found that cleaning the floors was a long, drawn-out task but no more thanks to my JinClean cotton floor mop. I also purchased the dust spray which acts like a dust magnet and with two dogs in my household JinClean has become my new BFF! I'm done cleaning my floors in half the time now; great product.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for open floors not corners
customer_reviews.text: I only have one critique and that is that the mop head can only be pushed forward or backwards because the pole clips in. I’d give the product 5 stars if the pole was able to be moved in any direction allowing the mop head to stay flat to the ground while making any type of turns. Otherwise for the quality, price, and size is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, doesn't turn at all only fixed direction of forward. Suggest you spend a few extra dollars and get an upgraded one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to help me keep dark laminate flooring clean and unmarked. This works beautifully and is all I had hoped it would be. I received this product very quickly, had it assembled in 90 seconds, and took it on its first tour of the house immediately following assembly. There's no way to glamorize a dust mop other than to say it performs its much needed function very well, is easy to use, and provides the desired outcome. This one does all three.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Buy this dust mop!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this dust mop! Look if you want to save time get this dust mop. This is a game changer in the sweeping tasks at home. Cuts sweeping time in half and now I can spend more time in my autobiography. The chronicles of my life as a competitive floor sweeper is now expected to be published much sooner! Thanks 24" dust mop!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Javier

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this.  But a simple wood pole that doesn’t adjust
customer_reviews.text: The handle on this mop doesn’t stay at one length and as a result can only be used at the lowest setting. The adjusting height tool in the middle of the mop doesn’t stick.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great at cleaning floor
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Strong long arm. Great at cleaning floors. Easy to take broom off
customer_reviews.author: moy

customer_reviews.title: Mop is not as described
customer_reviews.text: Dust mop was purchased to dust mop laminate flooring. It does not attract dust, it is difficult to manuver unless you are simply going in a straight line and the mop portion is cheaply made. This dust mop was not at all what was expected.
customer_reviews.author: E. SAMUELS

customer_reviews.title: JINCLEAN 24" Industrial Class Cotton Floor Mop
customer_reviews.text: 24" Cotton Floor Mop shipped fast. worked great at first until it would not tighten again. may be a small fix but I have not had it for a long time. I also did not get intouch with the company to see if they could do anything about it. I loved it when it was working.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Brawler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't throw up dust and hairs as you clean
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what took me so long to switch to this floor mop. My old broom will be put to rest. My whole house is hardwood floors and this product has made my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Great dry mop!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome moo for wood floors and it’s big!! Nice and soft perfect for our newly refinished floors!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Live it. Cleans floor so fast and efficiently. ...
customer_reviews.text: Live it. Cleans floor so fast and efficiently. Shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog hair on wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: We just had Bamboo flooring laid through your home. I bought this item because I have 4 dogs that are 4lbs-70lbs. This grabs and pushes the hair and dirt in a wide area super good!
customer_reviews.author: TJRodg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: takes 1/2 the time to do the floor because it's so large and it does a GREAT job! I ended up throwing my other microfiber and swiffers away!
customer_reviews.author: theMoMMy

customer_reviews.title: Handle is not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this dry mop for my hardwood floors. Used it for about 8 months, and the handle broke. I was used to the wooden handles that allowed you to really shake the dust out, so I would vigorously shake my dust mop after each use. The handle kinked, then eventually snapped. It looks like a good replacement handle is about the price of this system. Would recommend a dust mop with a fiberglass or wooden handle.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Revived damaged product but useful and good design.
customer_reviews.text: This product was definitely useful. Picked up dirt the broom missed. Easy to detach for replacement. I was disappointed when I first opened the product because it was damaged. I didn’t bother sending it back because if the hassle. Pics are straight out the box!
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: A God send!!
customer_reviews.text: 3 months ago I had my bathroom remodeled. Its beautiful but I had white film on my floors. Mopping did nothing! On the 1st try with your sweeper, film GONE!!
customer_reviews.author: patsy lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to mop my laminate floors. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Clawson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Has made sweeping so much easier! Tall enough for my 6' 6" son to use comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Frame and handle are very rugged. Mop head works great but a little lighter weight than a true commercial head. Overall very pleased with it, and I use it in my shop so it has to work hard. Tried it on my hardwood floors before it went in the shop and cleaned 1000 sq. feet in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Imbasman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband is thrilled with his new mop, er toy!! It is so easy to use and care for.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I made this purchase for hardwood floors. Excellent purchase, good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian M. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Good Mop
customer_reviews.text: Maneuvers well. Picks up dirt well. Handle often becomes loose and falls out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on our new hardwood floors and it's wonderful! Easy to put together and use.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S. Millam

customer_reviews.title: Handle / pole doesn’t lock properly
customer_reviews.text: The handle / pole needs some work . It doesn’t lock properly
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Finally a dust mop that I like. This dust mop saves me so much time and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I wish it swiveled a little smoother, but thats the only thing I can add. It's a dust mop for christ sakes. It works. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Defoedirtbikes

customer_reviews.title: Fast & easy way to clean wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size to make mopping faster! The handle when extended tends to slide down....not a tight grip. Hoping the swivel will loosen up over time. Overall I would buy this mop again......much better than others I tried before from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great on laminate floors. Helps pick up dog hairs. Better than a vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Great Dust Mop for Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this dust mop. We found it easy to assemble, easy to use and it does a great job!!
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Not great turn radius
customer_reviews.text: The turn radius is not a great as I would like. I find myself having to pick up the broom to turn it at times.
customer_reviews.author: Pat McD

customer_reviews.title: It is a Huge mop!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a huge mop and I loved it,.. can enter any places under the sofas and has a very good telescopic handle. It’s more friendly to use this mop than the vacuum. It could be used dry or wet...very good product and came very well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Anahi

customer_reviews.title: large enough so I can get through the whole first floor of my house in about three minutes.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for my hardwood floors. Trust me it is large enough so I can get through the whole first floor of my house in about three minutes.
customer_reviews.author: CLD

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning up is quick and simple
customer_reviews.text: Just installed new laminated flooring and this mop makes it so easy and quick to clean up. One of my best purchases on amazon so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Perez

customer_reviews.title: great  duster
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what i was looking for, very pleased works great
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I’ve purchased to clean my House. Really helps save on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Good! A bit hard to maneuver but the size is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gennissa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Terrazzo floors
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something better than a broom for my floors and this is it. It make the cleaning so easy. I have no regrets and my bare feet like the clean floors
customer_reviews.author: Fred S. Judkins II

customer_reviews.title: Mop
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful product. I gave easy to use only 3 stars because it's so heavy to use for me
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning our newly installed SPC tile flooring!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product - maneuvers easily and we just store it in the pantry for easy access. Much better than using a broom on our new floors.
customer_reviews.author: DBG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my newly installed tile floors. So much easier than a standard broom!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Oh yea!!!! Just what the Dr ordered well, just the most perfect dust mop I ever ordered. We love it. It’s very well made and we feel it will outlast our now broken old dust mop purchased from a different company. Buy one and you’ll notice the difference right out of the box. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: The mop really works great with the swivel head under the bed and cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Used for cleaning laminate floor in a small mobile home. Dust mop is quite large but with the swivel it gets under bed and cabinetry very. Great Product.....Really appreciate it. Doug
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Bad handle design.
customer_reviews.text: Mophead works perfect. But the handle does not tighten and cannot be replaced with any old handle.
customer_reviews.author: aaron pixton

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge hard wood room at our cabin that previously took an hour to sweep, daily. We are talking lots of sand in and out. This dust mop has made my life so much easier. The best part is, the kids love using it! They do the mopping now and I vacuum up the sandy pile at the end. It’s saved me hours of work that’s now spent in the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I just purchased a new home that has zero carpet. Being pet owners, we knew keeping it clean with a regular broom simply wasn't going to cut it. This product is exactly what we were looking for. It works well and seems to be quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: handle would not stay locked in place, would not swivel on mop head having to pick whole mop to sweep, not a good design made to cheaply, will check other models.
customer_reviews.author: John Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I regret this purchase, the maneuverability is not good and it misses a lot of stuff off our hardwood floor and laminate floors. 2/5
customer_reviews.author: Muriel

customer_reviews.title: Handle isn’t horrible as people make it out
customer_reviews.text: Reviews are a joke that gave it one star. Not sure what handle they were expecting as this thing is awesome! I was super worried; but Amazon’s return policy is amazing so it was worth a shot! Love it. Buy it and you won’t be dissapointned by the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great for large floors
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases I have made. I have a lot of wood floors and this mop covers such a large area...it's awesome!!! I just dust the floor then vacuum the dust mop off. It makes cleaning a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product with Great price
customer_reviews.text: This mop is doing well in its new home. It likes it and we like it, too. Easy to push around though - so, give it a pep talk every few days and all should be well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great cleaning tool
customer_reviews.text: This mop does a great job on my hardwood floors. The swivel head is really nice and better than others I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Jcc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's so smooth and easy to use. I can hold my baby and push around with 1 hand
customer_reviews.author: Felicia & nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for a few days now. What took much longer with an ordinary broom is quick and easy with this floor mop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just what the Country Club was looking for and half the price of our usual vendor! Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a cheap knock-off of the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 1 year, 1 per week. It works good. It feels cheap, but it works
customer_reviews.author: Mike Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this dry mop! Our basement was flooded during the wet summer here in PA. We had carpet in previously but decided to go with wood look vinyl. So I wanted a large dry mop to use since it is such a large area. This fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HANDLE SPONTANEOUSLY COLLAPSES
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo disappointed in this product! As various people stated, when I first researched the mop, the handle frequently collapses. Very frustrating when you are dusting the floors and suddenly you are bending over! This is a serious flaw in the product!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen  Konnert

customer_reviews.title: Quickly sweep dirt from your floor
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new house with large white tiles and my girlfriends hair was showing up EVERYWHERE. Needed something that covered large areas and picked up surface dirt with ease. This does exactly what it supposed to and the handle works as its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Functional and sturdy mop
customer_reviews.text: The mop has a nice swivel ability as well as a locking position that keeps the head steady. The handle is very strong and the length of the mop covers a nice large area for in home use.
customer_reviews.author: dcgreen

customer_reviews.title: Dust free floors
customer_reviews.text: Reallly does a great job on my floors. Great product and arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: bridget perez

customer_reviews.title: Does great to pick up dust!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mop ever for cleaning hardwood floors. We live on a farm and the dust is insane. With this sweeper, I can push it around multiple times a day and make a pile to vacuum. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Vinyl Floors
customer_reviews.text: We just had luxury vinyl planks installed and this dust mop just what I needed to keep the floors looking great. I use it daily and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality dust mop
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dust mop. We use it in our hair salon every night before closing. It gets all the little fine hairs up that a broom misses. Very easy to maneuver around without killing your back.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great for laminate floors!
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this dust mop. Great quality for a fair price. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the joint at the head of the mop doesn't rotate, making it difficult to maneuver turns and corners. Overall, good product 👌
customer_reviews.author: Reanna Molinaro
